a:1:{i:0;a:2:{s:5:"title";s:59:"Match the Category - IELTS Subject Classification Exercise";s:7:"content";s:803:"Instructions: For each group of subjects, identify which category they belong to. Category Options: Technology The arts The media Health Life and leisure Society and government Education Transport Crime and punishment The environment This exercise will help you identify common IELTS writing and speaking topics and understand how different subjects are categorized. Being able to recognize these categories will help you: 1. Better understand IELTS questions 2. Organize your thoughts when planning your response 3. Use appropriate vocabulary for each topic area 4. Identify the main theme of reading passages Look carefully at all the subjects in each group to identify the common theme that connects them.";}}
